name: NeogenesisPrePrePrePrePreAlpha
description:
Well, technically it's play-able, if you get it or have it, have fun.

Controls: W,A,S,D, right click to zoom in, left click to shoot, left shift to dash, f to slow-mo, Q to throw a grenade (not complete code), go onto a wall sideways to wall run, look at the wall and go forward while falling to mantle.

Thats all for now, there are some glitches, but they should not be game breaking. 

(I've just realized that it isn't playable, I'm going to try to get a .exe file)
